result.reason: Users currently need to create a separate PuTTY session to use a private key file; adding a dedicated PrivateKeyPath property to the connection settings would simplify SSH configuration.
result.approach: Add a new PrivateKeyPath property to AbstractConnectionRecord with a custom file picker editor attribute. Update PuttyBase.Connect to check this property and append the '-i' argument to the PuTTY command line if a key file is specified.
